text:
"Child's Play" is an American horror movie. It was directed by Lars Klevberg. It was written by Tyler Burton Smith. It is based on the 1988 movie of the same name.
It stars Gabriel Bateman, Aubrey Plaza, Tim Matheson and Brian Tyree Henry with Mark Hamill as the voice of Chucky, and is produced by Seth Grahame-Smith and David Katzenberg and Aaron Schmidt. The movie was released in the United States on June 21, 2019.
